content: this legal text is about a court case that took place in rome in 2009 the case is identified as number 4021 and is being heard in court section viii the text explains the progress of a legal case regarding the division of a building land in rome the courtappointed expert described the land in a report in 1996 and assigned three cosharers to specific portions of the property certain areas of the property will remain common to all parties the costs of the proceedings are to be shared by all parties the judgment will be transcribed and the portions of the property will be identified in the cadastral register the decision was made in december 2008
